medical_history.chief_complaint: Abdominal pain localized to the right lower quadrant.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The abdominal pain began 48 hours prior to presentation, initially diffuse and vague, then localized to the right lower quadrant. Pain worsened with physical activity and ambulation. Patient denies fever, nausea, emesis, anorexia, or any other symptoms.
